idea-plugin.name: PipelineLens
idea-plugin.description:
PipelineLens - Professional Jenkins Pipeline Development Tool

PipelineLens is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin designed specifically for Jenkins Pipeline development, providing comprehensive syntax support, intelligent code completion, and visual enhancements.

  • Enhanced Syntax Highlighting: VS Code-style syntax highlighting with 11 vibrant colors
  • Intelligent Code Completion: Keywords and methods like pipeline, stage, step, etc.
  • Environment Variable Completion: Auto-recognition of env.BUILD_NUMBER, env.WORKSPACE, etc.
  • Parameter Completion: Auto-completion for params.APP_NAME, params.DEPLOY_ENV, etc.
  • Documentation Support: Hover to display method signatures and parameter descriptions
  • Customizable Colors: Adjust syntax highlighting colors in IDE settings

Dramatically improve Jenkins Pipeline development efficiency, making CI/CD pipeline writing more efficient, professional, and enjoyable!
